events.message: I am reporting a vehicle collision that occurred yesterday on the highway involving my car and another sedan.
Your claim has been categorized under Auto Accident as it concerns damages from a car collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claims process.
Your claim has been acknowledged. We are committed to providing timely assistance to resolve your case.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, a police report, and your driver's license to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents, including the police report and pictures of the accident, have been uploaded to your claim file.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the details and evidence related to your car accident.
The review of your case and all documents is complete. We have gathered all necessary information.
We have proposed a settlement offer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage details.
The customer has reviewed the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the offered amount.
Your claim has been approved and payment processing will begin shortly.
The settlement payment has been issued to your bank account according to the agreed terms.
Your auto accident claim has been successfully closed. Thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
